title: Mendy to miss Senegal's AFCON opener after positive COVID-19 test
shortDescription: Edouard Mendy will miss Senegal's opening Africa Cup of Nations match against Zimbabwe on Monday after testing positive for coronavirus.

title: Welch becomes first woman referee in FA Cup third round
shortDescription: Rebecca Welch becomes the first woman referee to take charge of a men's FA Cup third-round tie.

title: Klopp to return to Liverpool dugout vs Shrewsbury
shortDescription: Jurgen Klopp will return to the dugout for Liverpool's home FA Cup third-round tie against Shrewsbury Town on Sunday.

title: Sunday's latest scores and fixtures
shortDescription: Keep up to date with all the FA Cup ties, plus action from the WSL, AFCON and other leagues around Europe...

title: Lottery if Saints can play Brentford game - Hasenhuttl
shortDescription: Ralph Hasenhuttl is unsure if Southampton will have enough players for Tuesday's Premier League clash with Brentford due to injuries and Covid.

title: Cavallo calls out homophobic abuse in A-League game
shortDescription: Josh Cavallo, who is the only out gay professional top-flight men's footballer in the world, has called out homophobic abuse during an A-League game.

title: Simmons: No current concerns over another Coventry Utd
shortDescription: Kelly Simmons has told Sky Sports the FA is constantly monitoring the budgets of clubs to help prevent another club like Coventry United from facing liquidation.

shortDescription: All the latest Chelsea transfer news, rumours and gossip...

title: Benitez unconcerned by banner calling for his exit
shortDescription: Rafa Benitez insists he is not worried for his Everton future despite a banner in the away end calling for his exit during the Toffees' 3-2 FA Cup win at Hull.

title: Livramento may require knee surgery, reveals Hasenhuttl
shortDescription: Ralph Hasenhuttl revealed Tino Livramento may require surgery on a knee injury after his 10-man Southampton side claimed an extra-time FA Cup win at Swansea.

title: Euro round-up: Dortmund reignite title bid, Barca held
shortDescription: Borussia Dortmund fought back from two goals down after a lacklustre start to beat Eintracht Frankfurt 3-2 and return some excitement to the Bundesliga title race.

title: Townsend ends heroic Hull effort in extra-time
shortDescription: Andros Townsend's extra-time screamer saved Everton's blushes as under-fire Rafael Benitez saw his side stumble into the FA Cup fourth round with a 3-2 triumph at Hull.

title: Lukaku on target as Chelsea cruise past Chesterfield
shortDescription: Returning Romelu Lukaku struck as Chelsea cruised to a comfortable victory against non-League Chesterfield in a 5-1 FA Cup third-round canter at Stamford Bridge.

title: Hits and misses: Underdogs, upsets light up FA Cup
shortDescription: The highs and lows as underdogs and archetypal upsets sprinkled stardust over a dramatic Saturday of FA Cup third-round action...

title: 10-man Saints edge Swansea to reach round four
shortDescription: Southampton survived the first-half dismissal of Yan Valery to reach the fourth round of the FA Cup with a 3-2 extra-time win at Swansea.
